About
Clancy’s Irish Sports Pub & Grill
Welcome to Clancy’s Irish Sports Pub & Grill, the heart of Bradenton’s community since 2000. Nestled at 6218 Cortez Rd. West, we blend the spirited charm of a traditional Irish pub with the sunny vibe of a Floridian tiki bar.
Our Story
Founded on a passion for good food, great drinks, and even better company, Clancy’s has grown from a local hangout to a beloved destination for both residents and visitors. Our pub is a place where laughter fills the air, music lifts the spirits, and every night promises a new adventure.
Eclectic Atmosphere
Imagine an Irish tavern meets Jimmy Buffet’s paradise. From our unique Freaki Tiki bar to our cozy indoor setting, Clancy’s offers diverse spaces to enjoy.
Local Live Music and Entertainment
Every week, we feature some of the best local bands, thrilling karaoke nights, engaging trivia sessions, and lively poker and bingo games. Our stages are always set for unforgettable evenings.
Award-Winning Cuisine
Our kitchen prides itself on serving scrumptious dishes that have clinched the title of Best Food at the Taste of Manatee for three consecutive years. Whether you’re craving a hearty meal or a light snack, our menu has something to satisfy every palate
Sports and More
With large-screen TVs and a comprehensive sports package, you won’t miss a second of the action, from NFL games to golf tournaments.
Our Promise
At Clancy’s, our guests are family. We strive to provide a friendly atmosphere where everyone can feel at home. Enjoy our generous portions, fair prices, and the kind of personal service that makes every visit special.
Join Us
We’re more than just a pub; we’re a community. Whether you’re looking to unwind after a long day, catch up with friends, or celebrate a special occasion, Clancy’s is the place to be. Come on in and discover why we’re known as Bradenton’s best—where every visit is a celebration of good times.
Contact Us
Feeling intrigued? Give us a call at (941) 794-2489 or swing by. We look forward to welcoming you to Clancy’s Irish Sports Pub & Grill!
What Locals Love About Us
Don’t just take our word for it – see what our regulars have to say!

review us on
James Wesley Jr
01:06 24 Apr 24
Great time to spend with friends and meet new ones also.
Lisa Moscarello
04:39 12 Dec 23
My friend had the shepherds pie. She said it was very delicious. It had carrots and peas, beef, and mashed potatoes. I had the French dip. The Ajou was awesome. The beef tasted a little old but overall the sandwich was well prepared. had had good flavor. The portion was generous. I got sweet potato fries to go with it and they were spectacular. Our server was Dane, like great Dane and Dane gave great service.
Scott Siewert
02:01 22 Nov 23
Snowbirding in the area got a tip to check out Clancys and glad we did.
When we walked in bar area was full so we sat out on a table outside.
Server came by right away very friendly, had a couple beers.
I had the Fench dip Roast Beef and my wife The Reuben both were packed full of very very lean roast beef and lots of cheese "very delish".
We will return
Bryan Clapp
15:25 13 Nov 23
11/10/23 update. Stopped in for lunch and had the Italian Sub and French Dip. The French Dip was again, excellent! Juicy meat, soft bread and great au jus. Definitely a go to sandwich!
Stopped in as we were driving by and were starving. We walked in and were immediately greeted by Tana. We saw the back area, bar, stage, etc, and decided to sit outside. Lots of locals here. Tana was our server and is one of the best friendliest servers around! We ordered a couple drinks and decided on the Rueben and a French dip both with coleslaw. Everything was delicious and the owner, Rama, even stopped by, introduced herself and asked how we were doing. We will definitely be back!!!
Billie Thompson-Romie
19:32 18 Oct 23
Clancy is all about kickin back & having a great time! The food, drinks & ESPECIALLY the entertainment! With the right entertainment there’s standing room only & sooo much fun! There’s not a seat left in the house, it’s standing room only ( unless you’re out on the dance floor!)
ellen partal
10:24 12 Oct 23
Would I go back? Yes, in a heartbeat. The bar is large and area and the outside bar looked awesome. I sat inside and it was loud and the music was good. It could be too loud for some people.
We went to play Bingo with a big group of people and it was crowded. The parking looked like a used car lot there were so many cars. Plenty of parking for everyone though. They only had 2 wait staff and 1 bartender inside and one outside. Our waiters were drowning trying to keep up and they have Bingo and karaoke and live music all the time. Waiter forgot my drink and I had the nachos which were the wrong thing for me to order at a crowded table reaching over my bingo cards. The chips and beef were buried under a ton of lettuce, cheese and sour cream. The gal next to me had the Clancy's Rolls and they were really good.
The guy calling bingo had a great voice. He called the numbers very differently than anywhere I have been and it missed a couple of number because of the inconsistency.

Events
Stay in the Loop!
Every week at Clancy’s is filled with fun and exciting events that you won’t want to miss. From live music sessions featuring the best local talents to thrilling game nights and lively karaoke evenings, there’s always something happening that’s sure to make your visit memorable.
Plan Your Visit
Use our interactive calendar below to find out about upcoming events, special performances, and more. Whether you’re planning a casual evening out or looking for the perfect night to host a group get-together, our calendar makes it easy to keep track of all our events so you never miss out on the fun.

What Locals Love About Us
Don’t just take our word for it – see what our regulars have to say!

Based on 1685 reviews

review us on
James Wesley Jr
01:06 24 Apr 24
Great time to spend with friends and meet new ones also.
Lisa Moscarello
04:39 12 Dec 23
My friend had the shepherds pie. She said it was very delicious. It had carrots and peas, beef, and mashed potatoes. I had the French dip. The Ajou was awesome. The beef tasted a little old but overall the sandwich was well prepared. had had good flavor. The portion was generous. I got sweet potato fries to go with it and they were spectacular. Our server was Dane, like great Dane and Dane gave great service.
Scott Siewert
02:01 22 Nov 23
Snowbirding in the area got a tip to check out Clancys and glad we did.
When we walked in bar area was full so we sat out on a table outside.
Server came by right away very friendly, had a couple beers.
I had the Fench dip Roast Beef and my wife The Reuben both were packed full of very very lean roast beef and lots of cheese "very delish".
We will return
Bryan Clapp
15:25 13 Nov 23
11/10/23 update. Stopped in for lunch and had the Italian Sub and French Dip. The French Dip was again, excellent! Juicy meat, soft bread and great au jus. Definitely a go to sandwich!
Stopped in as we were driving by and were starving. We walked in and were immediately greeted by Tana. We saw the back area, bar, stage, etc, and decided to sit outside. Lots of locals here. Tana was our server and is one of the best friendliest servers around! We ordered a couple drinks and decided on the Rueben and a French dip both with coleslaw. Everything was delicious and the owner, Rama, even stopped by, introduced herself and asked how we were doing. We will definitely be back!!!
Billie Thompson-Romie
19:32 18 Oct 23
Clancy is all about kickin back & having a great time! The food, drinks & ESPECIALLY the entertainment! With the right entertainment there’s standing room only & sooo much fun! There’s not a seat left in the house, it’s standing room only ( unless you’re out on the dance floor!)
ellen partal
10:24 12 Oct 23
Would I go back? Yes, in a heartbeat. The bar is large and area and the outside bar looked awesome. I sat inside and it was loud and the music was good. It could be too loud for some people.
We went to play Bingo with a big group of people and it was crowded. The parking looked like a used car lot there were so many cars. Plenty of parking for everyone though. They only had 2 wait staff and 1 bartender inside and one outside. Our waiters were drowning trying to keep up and they have Bingo and karaoke and live music all the time. Waiter forgot my drink and I had the nachos which were the wrong thing for me to order at a crowded table reaching over my bingo cards. The chips and beef were buried under a ton of lettuce, cheese and sour cream. The gal next to me had the Clancy's Rolls and they were really good.
The guy calling bingo had a great voice. He called the numbers very differently than anywhere I have been and it missed a couple of number because of the inconsistency.

What Locals Love About Us
Don’t just take our word for it – see what our regulars have to say!

Based on 1685 reviews

review us on
James Wesley Jr
01:06 24 Apr 24
Great time to spend with friends and meet new ones also.
Lisa Moscarello
04:39 12 Dec 23
My friend had the shepherds pie. She said it was very delicious. It had carrots and peas, beef, and mashed potatoes. I had the French dip. The Ajou was awesome. The beef tasted a little old but overall the sandwich was well prepared. had had good flavor. The portion was generous. I got sweet potato fries to go with it and they were spectacular. Our server was Dane, like great Dane and Dane gave great service.
Scott Siewert
02:01 22 Nov 23
Snowbirding in the area got a tip to check out Clancys and glad we did.
When we walked in bar area was full so we sat out on a table outside.
Server came by right away very friendly, had a couple beers.
I had the Fench dip Roast Beef and my wife The Reuben both were packed full of very very lean roast beef and lots of cheese "very delish".
We will return
Bryan Clapp
15:25 13 Nov 23
11/10/23 update. Stopped in for lunch and had the Italian Sub and French Dip. The French Dip was again, excellent! Juicy meat, soft bread and great au jus. Definitely a go to sandwich!
Stopped in as we were driving by and were starving. We walked in and were immediately greeted by Tana. We saw the back area, bar, stage, etc, and decided to sit outside. Lots of locals here. Tana was our server and is one of the best friendliest servers around! We ordered a couple drinks and decided on the Rueben and a French dip both with coleslaw. Everything was delicious and the owner, Rama, even stopped by, introduced herself and asked how we were doing. We will definitely be back!!!
Billie Thompson-Romie
19:32 18 Oct 23
Clancy is all about kickin back & having a great time! The food, drinks & ESPECIALLY the entertainment! With the right entertainment there’s standing room only & sooo much fun! There’s not a seat left in the house, it’s standing room only ( unless you’re out on the dance floor!)
ellen partal
10:24 12 Oct 23
Would I go back? Yes, in a heartbeat. The bar is large and area and the outside bar looked awesome. I sat inside and it was loud and the music was good. It could be too loud for some people.
We went to play Bingo with a big group of people and it was crowded. The parking looked like a used car lot there were so many cars. Plenty of parking for everyone though. They only had 2 wait staff and 1 bartender inside and one outside. Our waiters were drowning trying to keep up and they have Bingo and karaoke and live music all the time. Waiter forgot my drink and I had the nachos which were the wrong thing for me to order at a crowded table reaching over my bingo cards. The chips and beef were buried under a ton of lettuce, cheese and sour cream. The gal next to me had the Clancy's Rolls and they were really good.
The guy calling bingo had a great voice. He called the numbers very differently than anywhere I have been and it missed a couple of number because of the inconsistency.

About
Clancy’s Irish Sports Pub & Grill
Welcome to Clancy’s Irish Sports Pub & Grill, the heart of Bradenton’s community since 2000. Nestled at 6218 Cortez Rd. West, we blend the spirited charm of a traditional Irish pub with the sunny vibe of a Floridian tiki bar.
Our Story
Founded on a passion for good food, great drinks, and even better company, Clancy’s has grown from a local hangout to a beloved destination for both residents and visitors. Our pub is a place where laughter fills the air, music lifts the spirits, and every night promises a new adventure.
Eclectic Atmosphere
Imagine an Irish tavern meets Jimmy Buffet’s paradise. From our unique Freaki Tiki bar to our cozy indoor setting, Clancy’s offers diverse spaces to enjoy.
Local Live Music and Entertainment
Every week, we feature some of the best local bands, thrilling karaoke nights, engaging trivia sessions, and lively poker and bingo games. Our stages are always set for unforgettable evenings.
Award-Winning Cuisine
Our kitchen prides itself on serving scrumptious dishes that have clinched the title of Best Food at the Taste of Manatee for three consecutive years. Whether you’re craving a hearty meal or a light snack, our menu has something to satisfy every palate
Sports and More
With large-screen TVs and a comprehensive sports package, you won’t miss a second of the action, from NFL games to golf tournaments.
Our Promise
At Clancy’s, our guests are family. We strive to provide a friendly atmosphere where everyone can feel at home. Enjoy our generous portions, fair prices, and the kind of personal service that makes every visit special.
Join Us
We’re more than just a pub; we’re a community. Whether you’re looking to unwind after a long day, catch up with friends, or celebrate a special occasion, Clancy’s is the place to be. Come on in and discover why we’re known as Bradenton’s best—where every visit is a celebration of good times.
Contact Us
Feeling intrigued? Give us a call at (941) 794-2489 or swing by. We look forward to welcoming you to Clancy’s Irish Sports Pub & Grill!

My friend had the shepherds pie. She said it was very delicious. It had carrots and peas, beef, and mashed potatoes. I had the French dip. The Ajou was awesome. The beef tasted a little old but overall the sandwich was well prepared. had had good flavor. The portion was generous. I got sweet potato fries to go with it and they were spectacular. Our server was Dane, like great Dane and Dane gave great service.
Scott Siewert
02:01 22 Nov 23
Snowbirding in the area got a tip to check out Clancys and glad we did.
When we walked in bar area was full so we sat out on a table outside.
Server came by right away very friendly, had a couple beers.
I had the Fench dip Roast Beef and my wife The Reuben both were packed full of very very lean roast beef and lots of cheese "very delish".
We will return
Bryan Clapp

11/10/23 update. Stopped in for lunch and had the Italian Sub and French Dip. The French Dip was again, excellent! Juicy meat, soft bread and great au jus. Definitely a go to sandwich!
Stopped in as we were driving by and were starving. We walked in and were immediately greeted by Tana. We saw the back area, bar, stage, etc, and decided to sit outside. Lots of locals here. Tana was our server and is one of the best friendliest servers around! We ordered a couple drinks and decided on the Rueben and a French dip both with coleslaw. Everything was delicious and the owner, Rama, even stopped by, introduced herself and asked how we were doing. We will definitely be back!!!

ellen partal
10:24 12 Oct 23
Would I go back? Yes, in a heartbeat. The bar is large and area and the outside bar looked awesome. I sat inside and it was loud and the music was good. It could be too loud for some people.
We went to play Bingo with a big group of people and it was crowded. The parking looked like a used car lot there were so many cars. Plenty of parking for everyone though. They only had 2 wait staff and 1 bartender inside and one outside. Our waiters were drowning trying to keep up and they have Bingo and karaoke and live music all the time. Waiter forgot my drink and I had the nachos which were the wrong thing for me to order at a crowded table reaching over my bingo cards. The chips and beef were buried under a ton of lettuce, cheese and sour cream. The gal next to me had the Clancy's Rolls and they were really good.
The guy calling bingo had a great voice. He called the numbers very differently than anywhere I have been and it missed a couple of number because of the inconsistency.
